howIdentityDocsCheckedTabTitle: How were their identity documents checked? welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedTitle: Which option from the identity verification standard did you use to verify their identity? welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedHint: You must have used one of the 2 options for checking identity documents from Companies House identity verification standard. welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedOption1hint: Their identity documents were checked using identity document validation technology (IDVT). welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedOption2hint: Their identity documents were checked by a person. welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedInfoHeading: What is Companies House identity verification standard? welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedInfoText1: The identity verification standard outlines the checks you must do to verify someone's identity for Comapnies House. welsh
howIdentityDocsCheckedInfoText2Link: guidance on how to meet the identity verification standard. welsh
